text: NASDAQ is a stock exchange in New York City. It stands for National Association of Securities Dealers Automated Quotations. About 3,800 companies trade on it. It is owned by a company called Nasdaq, Inc. NASDAQ was founded in 1971 by the National Association of Securities Dealers (NASD). In 2023 it bought the financial software company Adenza, for $10.5 billion. NASDAQ is a financial services corporation. == References == Category:1971 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in New York City Category:Stock exchanges in the United States
title: NASDAQ
